EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - TaaS - 2014.12.03.Email - Follow Up - No Show
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry we missed you at our webinar: Testing in the Cloud with Tosca
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Webinar: Testing in the Cloud with Tosca
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Sorry we missed you at our webinar “Testing in the Cloud with Tosca”. Tricentis’ very own, Michael Niessl, talked about the challenges of on-premise installations and gave a short introduction and live demo of our new Cloud-Based Test Management Suite, Tosca-as-a-Service (TaaS). Questions from the audience made the discussion lively. For more information about TaaS, please feel free to download our or check out our TaaS solutions page <http://www.tricentis.com/solutions/TaaS> and video <http://www.tricentis.com/products/what-is-new> which highlights all of its capabilities.
Want to see what you missed? Watch the recording here <http://www.tricentis.com/resources/webcasts>. Best regards,
The Tricentis Webinar Team
Michael Niessl TaaS Product Owner Tricentis
Jessica Chao Product Marketing Specialist Tricentis
